# Architektur {#sec-culture-architecture}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
Russia has architecture that is superior to Ukraine's
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- Ukrainian architecture has its earliest roots in the East Slavic state of Kyiv Rus'
- Ukrainian architecture is rich and diverse
- Russia would have liked Kyiv Rus', but has socialist classicism and brutalism 
:::
